by.horant.fintask.dao

Interface DataDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SQLDataDao

    public interface DataDAO
    The user of this interface undertakes to implement interaction with the database for obtaining various list of entity objects, implementing such methods as obtaining users, receiving orders, obtaining drugs and obtaining the requested recipes.
    Author:
    Anton Horbach

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Medicine> getMedicines()
      Returns medicines list.

      Returns orders list.
      java.util.List<RequestedPrescription> getRequestedPrescriptions()
      Returns requested prescriptions list.
      java.util.List<User> getUsers()
      Returns users list.
